title: kAttirukkinrEn shivanE
sahitya:
kAttirukkinrEn shivanE un kAdal perugiyE kaDum tavattAl urugiyE


anupallavi

  pArttup-pArttuk-kaNNum pUtt-anudinamum paramA unai sErum varamE vENDi nAn


caraNam    takkanin serukkozhittAi nAnum vELvit-taNal kuLitt-avatarittEn
akkaNam kayilaiyilE nIyum Azhndanai arum tavattil mikka uLLanbuDanE
un karuNaiyai mEviDap-pUjai sheidEn nam pakkam vand-ambu viTTa 
mathan sheyal pAzh paDa shuTTerittAi manam piriyAmalE
inam pirinda mAn pOl anavaratamum en Ashai tuDituDikka
